UnknownServiceException(java.lang.String.Description: Constructs a new UnknownServiceException with the specified detail message.

UnknownServiceException().Description: Constructs a new UnknownServiceException with no detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown to indicate that an unknown service exception has occurred. Either the MIME type returned by a URL connection does not make sense, or the application is attempting to write to a read-only URL connection.
